version_description:
- Now you can expand album/artist summary if it's too long to display
- Huge improvement on startup time, it now scans really fast even if you have a massive music library
- Fix minor animation glitches and flickers, animations never looked better before

If you like Eavescrob or you have any suggestions, please consider writing a review and it'll keep me making this app better. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

# BIG UPDATE #
Introducing Eavescrob 2.0:

# Discover Music
- Now you can view similar songs and artists
- Top songs and albums are available for artists now
- Click a tag to see its top songs, albums and artists
- Added shortcut to see your weekly listening report on Last.fm

# Connect with Friends
- Tap on your avatar to see what your friends have been listening to
- Use the iMessage extension to share your recent scrobbles and see your friend's recent activities

# Apple Watch Support
- It's even more awesome to view your listening history, upload scrobbles and love your now-playing song on your wrist

# Enhanced Widget
- Now you can see, love and unlove your current playing song directly from Today Widget

# Background Scrobbling
- Enable 'Auto Scrobble' in 'More' to get your pending scrobbles uploaded as soon as possible
- Auto scrobbling happens every time you open Eavescrob on your phone or watch, or when a Background App Refresh was triggered by the system

If you like Eavescrob or you have any suggestions, please consider writing a review and it'll keep me making this app better. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.
